name: Folk
description: Rooted in mostly oral traditions of the peoples of the world, encompassing international Traditional Folk Music as well as Western Contemporary Folk which arose in the 1940s.

sub_genres.name: Contemporary Folk
sub_genres.description: Generally acoustic and rooted in modernized Traditional Folk Music, originated with the 20th century American folk revival.

sub_genres.name: Traditional Folk Music
sub_genres.description: Informed by a long history of tradition in a specific culture or region, mostly associated with the peasantry and non-aristocratic public.
